title: no key fragmens
body:
recently i got thresh{{champion:412}}  from a box  and i got him with blue essence i played in ranked 2 matches supp and one match top
in the supp lanes i got A+ and A in the top lane i got S score but the weird thing is that i didnt get a box nor a key the weirder thing is that when i go to my collection the put in my season highest grade;N/A as if i didnt have him what is the problem

replies.body: It looks like your out of mastery chest drops for the week.  One will replenish per week per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, so hang tight for that.  You can check how many chests you have remaining for the week in your Profile pane.  Let me know if that clears things up!
